quest.name: A toy for the children
quest.brief: Grug have only bones and rocks to keep family happy. Want make toy for Grugling, but need clay. Shaman say there lots of clay past river, south, where land green and water big. You bring Grug clay?
quest.debrief: You make Grug happy. Toy will make Grugling happy.

quest.name: Kron's Kill
quest.brief: Kron hunt big goat today for tribe, but too much meat to carry. Meat rotting; soon no good to eat. You get rest of meat? Kron remember hunting west, near river. Go fast, before meat rot!
quest.debrief: You bring meat! Now whole tribe can eat big. You very fast and strong. Kron have idea to make men even more fast and strong--what we need is place to practice and learn. Kron tell you idea and you build, yes?
